about_the_game:
Experience the full soundtrack of Salus per aquam and dive deeper into the game’s metaphysical ambiance.
This DLC includes 8 instrumental tracks that blend ambient, epic, and idyllic elements. Featuring ancient instruments for the main theme, each track is meticulously titled in Italian and Latin to evoke a Mediterranean and classical feel.
The music represents the connective tissue between the mystery of the narrative and the enigma of the gameplay, evolving into a crescendo of intrigue that culminates in a divine resolution. Designed to complement the game’s rhythmic gameplay and silent narrative, this soundtrack enhances the immersive experience of Salus per aquam.
Enjoy the evocative sounds independently or relive the moments from the game with this captivating score.
